sources.title: The Brain Machine (1972) Sci-Fi, Thriller Psychotronic Film
sources.description:
It Has No Conscience, It Shows No Mercy!
Several people volunteer for a scientific experiment about mind-reading and memory, but the experiment goes horribly wrong.

Director: Joy N. Houck Jr.
Writers: Thomas Hal Phillips, Christian Garrison 
Stars: James Best, Barbara Burgess, Gil Peterson 
Genres: Sci-Fi, Thriller

@CultCinemaClassics:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics 
https://www.twitch.tv/cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: When a group of unknowing thrill seekers volunteer for what they think will be the experiment of a life time, they set out to achieve the ultimate ability to read minds and expand their memory. But this group gets more than they bargained for when the experiment goes horribly wrong.
metadata.Writer: Thomas Hal Phillips, Christian Garrison, Joy N. Houck Jr.
metadata.Actors: James Best, Barbara Burgess, Gil Peterson
